Package game.actions

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AddBalanceAction
    An action that adds the value of Runes to the actor's balance and removes the Runes from the actor's inventory.
    AttackAction
    Action for attacking another Actor.
    ChangeAttributeAction
    An action that allows an actor to consume an item, resulting in a change to one of the actor's attributes.
    ChangeMaxAttributeAction
    An action that increases the maximum value of an attribute of an actor.
    DeathAction
    Action that is performed when Player dies.
    DrinkPuddleAction
    Action for drinking from a puddle.
    FocusAction
    An action to activate the skill of Broadsword (focus).
    GreatSlamAction
    The class represents a great slam action.
    HealAction
    An action to heal the player.
    MonologueAction
    Action that chooses a random monologue from the list of monologues when the player talks to an actor.
    RefreshAction
    An action to recover Player's stamina.
    SellAction
    A class representing the action of selling an item in the game.
    StabStepAction
    The class represents a stab and step action.
    TickableAction
    A class that represents a tickable action.
    TravelAction
    An action that allows the actor to travel to another map.
    UnlockAction
    Action for unlocking the gate.
    UpgradeAction
    Action that allows an actor to upgrade an item.
